description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a login page, managing user input, validation, and navigation upon login attempts.

classes.name: LoginPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the user login screen.

classes.name: _LoginPageState
classes.description: State class managing the login page's UI interactions and logic.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the LoginPage widget.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of controllers when the widget is removed.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission for login, including calling the auth provider and navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the login page UI.
